name: Neufast Pte. Ltd.
description: Neufast Enterprise SaaS offers patented debiased AI for video interview and pre-employment talent assessment that is addressing the need of discovering competencies, skills and knowledge, faster and fairer in 13 Asian and European languages. We empower our client with significant cost savings in talent screening while meeting ESG targets for Diversity and Inclusion with Neufast's multi-lingual, AI-powered, gender-neutral talent assessment cloud solution.
Headline: Hire Faster & Fairer. Make accurate decisions.
ShortDescription: Neufast is an award-winning HR Tech company.

Highlights.name: AI bot
Highlights.description: Interview bot conducts structured behavioral interviews in English, Mandarin, Cantonese & Thai languages.

Highlights.name: Algorithm analysis
Highlights.description: Algorithm analyzes interview performance with 83% accuracy and NDCG of 0.95 for matching client's candidate ranking.

Highlights.name: customize
Highlights.description: Recruiters customize competency model with specific weightings for behavioural competencies.

enhanced_description: Neufast Enterprise SaaS provides a patented, debiased AI-powered cloud solution for video interviews and pre-employment talent assessment. It is designed to rapidly and fairly discover candidate competencies, skills, and knowledge, supporting talent screening in 13 Asian and European languages. The platform utilizes an AI bot for structured behavioral interviews, currently supporting English, Mandarin, Cantonese, and Thai. Its algorithm analyzes interview performance with 83% accuracy and a high NDCG of 0.95 for matching client's candidate rankings, leading to better job-fit. Neufast empowers clients to achieve significant cost savings in talent screening while helping meet ESG targets for Diversity and Inclusion through its multi-lingual, gender-neutral talent assessment capabilities. Recruiters can customize competency models with specific weightings for behavioral competencies to ensure a tailored assessment approach.
competitive_advantages: Patented Debiased AI for fair assessment
Multi-lingual support across 13 Asian and European languages
AI bot conducts structured behavioral interviews in specific languages (English, Mandarin, Cantonese, Thai)
Significant cost savings in talent screening
High accuracy in interview performance analysis (83% accuracy, NDCG 0.95)
Customizable competency models with specific weightings for behavioral competencies
Supports meeting ESG targets for Diversity and Inclusion
roi_benefits: Significant cost savings in talent screening
Achievement of ESG targets for Diversity and Inclusion
compliance_features: Debiased AI for fairness and non-discrimination
Supports Diversity and Inclusion initiatives (ESG targets)
